name: Jaakko Peltonen
content: Jaakko Peltonen | Tampere universitiesJaakko PeltonenProfessor, tilastotiede, erityisesti data-analyysiFaculty of Information Technology and Communication Sciences | Computing SciencesTampere Universityjaakko.peltonen [at] tuni.fi (jaakko[dot]peltonen[at]tuni[dot]fi)phone number+358503187116Hervanta CampusOrcidhttps://orcid.org/0000-0003-3485-8585About meI am a professor of statistics and data analysis at Tampere University , Faculty of Information Technology and Communication Sciences. I am the leader of the Statistical Machine Learning and Exploratory Data Analysis (SMiLE) research group . I am a member of the Tampere Research Center in Information and Systems and a member of the Academy of Finland Center of Excellence in Game Culture Studies . Please see a full description at: https://www.sis.uta.fi/~tojape/
